definition: (of a list, music chart etc) to reach the top

to scale (a height)/to ascend/to mount/to publish or record/to enter (e.g. in a register)/to press down with the foot/to step or tread on/to put on (shoes or trousers) (dialect)/to be gathered and taken to the threshing ground (old)

sentences.english: Joyride topped the US chart in spring 1991.
sentences.chinese: 专辑《逍遥游》于1991年春荣登美国排行榜榜首。

sentences.english: Was the champion of HK and Singapore box office.
sentences.chinese: 香港和新加坡票房荣登同期港产票房冠军。

sentences.english: But still, I expect China to topple US at the top.
sentences.chinese: 不过我还是期望中国超过美国荣登榜首。

definition: to continue in a post/(to hold a post) several times in succession/(to win a title) in successive years/to stay at number one/to defend a championship
notice or announcement/list of names/public roll of successful examinees
to appear on the public roll of successful examinees (i.e. pass an exam)/to make the list/(of a song) to hit the charts
to climb over/to ascend onto/to mount
laurel/victory garland (in Greek and Western culture)
to elect as/to choose as/to consider as
to rank (number 1, or third last etc)/to be among (those who are in a particular group)
